gists.name: CompileLogger
gists.description: The .cs file to log compilation to some file. useful with tail -f

gists.name: CreateAssemblyDefinitionForUdonSharp
gists.description: Adds menu to create assembly definition with U# assembly definition

gists.name: MapGameObjects
gists.description: MapGameObjects

gists.name: Fake DynamicBone Components
gists.description: Fake DynamicBone Component to make DB -> PB Converter in VRChat SDK works.

gists.name: ActualPerformanceWindow
gists.description: A window to see actual performance rank on building avatars

gists.name: PhysBoneEditorUtilities
gists.description: Set of utilities for PhysBone

gists.name: GenerateMeshWithBackFace
gists.description: generate new mesh with backface. useful for quest avatars

gists.name: Transfer Transform Window
gists.description: A window to copy transform info recursively

gists.name: SetRandomBlueprintId
gists.description: Set blueprint id without build

gists.name: AndroidOnlyCheck
gists.description: A VRCSDKPreprocessAvatarCallback which prevents PC builds.

gists.name: MergeAnimationClip
gists.description: Micro tool to multiple animation clip into one.

gists.name: CompilationLogWindow
gists.description: The window to see compilation progress

gists.name: HumanoidInfoWindow
gists.description: Actual bone mapping to Animator

gists.name: EditorScreenshotTakeTool
gists.description: A tool to take screen shot of an Editor

gists.name: SelectSkinnedMeshBones
gists.description: Select GameObjects used by SkinnedMeshRenderers

gists.name: FindReferenceChainRecursive
gists.description: Tool to find unexpected references in avatars or scenes

gists.name: RemovePropertiesFromAnimations
gists.description: A window to remove some property from multiple animations

gists.name: SetDirtyRecursively
gists.description: Set dirty all components on selected GameObject to avoid reference to prefab asset

gists.name: AlignXAxisOnPlaneWithYRotation
gists.description: Align X axis of multiple GameObjects onto plane of the gameobjects. This is made to align rotation of skirt bone.

gists.name: MultiGizmo
gists.description: Show multiple (non-editable) gizmos in the scene view

gists.name: Create Idle Animation
gists.description: Creates Idle face animation from SkinnedMeshRenderer

gists.name: Object Full Debug Inspector
gists.description: Object Full Debug Inspector (similar to internal debug inspector)

gists.name: Show Assets in Packages by Default in Selector Window
gists.description: In Unity, the selector window will not show assets in packages by default. This tool will change the default behavior to show assets in packages by default.

gists.name: ExportTextureAsPNG
gists.description: Save existing texture asset as PNG

gists.name: Manual Bake Preprocess Avatar Callbacks
gists.description: Left-click on an Avatar in the Hierarchy and select "Manual Bake Preprocess Avatar Callbacks" from the context menu.

gists.name: Combine Assets To Single File
gists.description: Combines multiple assets into a single file. Select Multiple Files and Right Click -> Assets -> Combine Assets To Single File

gists.name: Create Empty VRChat Avatar
gists.description: Fast way to create a new empty VRChat avatar for testing

gists.name: Remove Unused Animator Parameters
gists.description: Simple tool to remove unused animator parameter from animator controller

gists.name: Bake Override Controller
gists.description: The tool to bake Animator Override Controller to Animator Controller.

gists.name: Selection History
gists.description: This is a tool to back / forward history with mouse button 4, 5.
